name: Census of Agriculture
objective: The objective for NASS is to formulate, develop, and administer programs for collecting and publishing statistics related to agriculture, resources, and rural communities, including the Census of Agriculture.

results.description: Results of the 2022 Census of Agriculture were released February 13, 2024. Additional data products related to the Census that were also released include: State and County Profiles (released March 27, 2024); Congressional District Profiles and Rankings (released May 15, 2024); Race, Ethnicity, and Gender Profiles (released June 28, 2024); Puerto Rico Census of Agriculture (released July 18, 2024); Watersheds (released July 24, 2024); and American Indian Reservations (released August 29, 2024).
